originalTitle: My children were recruited in a trafficking scam. I joined a police hunt to find them
title: My children were recruited in a trafficking scam. I joined a police hunt to find them
content: BBC Africa Eye joins an anti-trafficking police unit in Sierra Leone helping a man look for his missing children.

originalTitle: 'Shameful' and 'terrible look' - the chaos that marred Senegal's triumph
title: 'Shameful' and 'terrible look' - the chaos that marred Senegal's triumph
content: Senegal beat Morocco to win the Africa Cup of Nations for a second time - but only after the final was overshadowed when they temporarily refuse to play after the hosts are awarded a controversial stoppage time-penalty with the match 0-0.

originalTitle: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
content: Yoweri Museveni has won a record seventh term in elections after promising that the fledgling oil sector will boost the economy.

originalTitle: From Uganda to Cameroon, how Africa’s ‘leaders for life’ stay in power
title: From Uganda to Cameroon, how Africa’s ‘leaders for life’ stay in power
content: Yoweri Museveni, Paul Biya, and other leaders use tactics including elections to cement their long rule, experts say.

originalTitle: Clashes in Colombia between rival rebel groups kill 27 people
title: Clashes in Colombia between rival rebel groups kill 27 people
content: The two groups have been fighting for control of the Guaviare region of the Amazon.

originalTitle: Senegal stun hosts Morocco to win AFCON title
title: Senegal stun hosts Morocco to win AFCON title
content: Senegal edge chaotic AFCON final as Gueye punishes penalty miss by Diaz to beat hosts Morocco 1-0 in extra time.

originalTitle: High-speed train collision in Spain kills at least 39
title: High-speed train collision in Spain kills at least 39
content: More than 400 passengers were on board the trains that derailed near the city of Córdoba in Spain's worst rail crash in more than a decade.

originalTitle: US believes its power matters more than international law, UN chief tells BBC
title: US believes its power matters more than international law, UN chief tells BBC
content: António Guterres says Washington's "clear conviction" is that multilateral solutions are irrelevant.

originalTitle: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
title: 'Europe won't be blackmailed,' Danish PM says in wake of Trump Greenland threats
content: Trump says he will impose new taxes on eight US allies in February if they oppose his proposed takeover of the autonomous Danish territory.

originalTitle: 'Shameful' and 'terrible look' - the chaos that marred Senegal's Afcon triumph
title: 'Shameful' and 'terrible look' - the chaos that marred Senegal's Afcon triumph
content: Senegal beat Morocco to win the Africa Cup of Nations for a second time - but only after the final was overshadowed when they temporarily refuse to play after the hosts are awarded a controversial stoppage time-penalty with the match 0-0.

originalTitle: 'Arsenal will never forgive themselves if they don't win title now'
title: 'Arsenal will never forgive themselves if they don't win title now'
content: This is Mikel Arteta and Arsenal's "now or never" moment as Premier League title rivals stumble badly, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Diaz will 'have nightmares' over 'Panenka' failure
content: Brahim Diaz had the chance to win Afcon for Morocco, but his choice to try a Panenka ended up costing his side dearly as Senegal hit back to win the game in extra time.
